message: "Victims are often afraid to come forward because they are embarrassed and believe there is a stigma surrounding human trafficking. Many individuals do not have homes to return to or a place for help and support. Albert explained the community has a responsibility to help."

data.description: Alexandra Cirovic ‘19 saw months of organization and promotion pay off on Jan. 31 as a lecture hall filled with students and teachers willing to learn and help the cause against human trafficking. The event included a guest lecture and discussion, and afterwards, guests created essential care kits...
data.title: Marist Student Coordinates Event to Combat Human Trafficking
